name: src/demo-manager-events.js
change
description:
A demo manager change event.

This event is dispatched by {@link DemoManager}.

name: load
description:
A demo manager load event.

This event is dispatched by {@link DemoManager}.

name: src/Demo.js
ready
description:
Indicates whether this demo is ready for rendering.

The {@link DemoManager} updates this flag automatically.

name: load
description:
Loads this demo.

Override this method to load assets.

return.description: A promise that will be fulfilled as soon as all assets have been loaded.

name: initialize
description:
Initialises this demo.

This method will be called after reset.

name: render
description:
Renders this demo.

Override this method to update and render the demo manually.

params.name: delta
params.description: The time since the last frame in seconds.

name: registerOptions
description:
Registers configuration options.

This method will be called once after initialize and then every time a new
demo is added.

name: src/DemoManager.js
menu
description: A menu for custom demo options.

name: demo
description: The id of the current demo.

name: resetMenu
todo: Use a menu library that is not as clunky as dat.GUI.

name: startDemo
description:
Activates the given demo if it's still selected.

While the demo was loading, another demo may have been selected already.

params.name: demo
params.description: A demo that just finished loading.

name: src/DemoManagerEvent.js
constructor
description: Constructs a new demo manager event.

name: src/index.js
./README.md
